full_title: Streets Made Me A King by Future & Metro Boomin
title: Streets Made Me A King

description.plain: ‘Streets Made Me A King’ serves as the closing track of ‘WE STILL DON’T TRUST YOU’’s second disc. Future gets personal about his tough come-up and experiences, while still relishing in his riches – namely girls, cars and watches. Metro offers a slower, introspective trap beat, in similar fashion to the last track of their first collaborative project, the bonus track ‘Where My Twin @’.

embed_content: Read “Streets Made Me A King” by Future & Metro Boomin on Genius
